TopicTitle: Fix the broken attachment mechanics with angle snap on the swept wings

Articles.Content:
This has been an issue ever since Squad introduced Porkjet's new Spaceplane+ wings. They look nice and are much more formal, but when you try to attach parts using angle snap along the angled sides of the wings, they will not attach to the part itself but is very broken (screenshots coming later) as it will connect far far off of where I am actually aiming, not to mention it will clip and is hard to use with angle snap. With free snap it's fine, but I like making things smooth and uniform so angle snap is my preference. This also spreads to the new airliner wing which has the same issue.

 

So please fix this as it's been an old issue that can annoy.

That's all for now.

Edited June 14, 2016 by ZooNamedGames

Screenshots uploaded.

Note- I have just seen that the behavior occurs across ALL swept wings with angle snap.
